CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Payment_Gateway__c ,"Razorpay"),"Razorpay", IF( ISPICKVAL( Payment_Gateway__c ,"Eazypay"),"Eazypay", IF( ISPICKVAL( Payment_Gateway__c ,"Billdesk"),"Billdesk", IF( ISPICKVAL( Payment_Gateway__c ,"Paytm"),"Paytm","Offline" ))))
CustomField.label: Mode of Payment with Payment Gateway
